mapper.select: SELECT a.name, t.accountId, t.id, t.date, t.description, t.amount FROM transactionT t INNER JOIN account a ON t.accountId = a.id
SELECT a.name, t.accountId, t.id, t.date, t.description, t.amount FROM transactionT t INNER JOIN account a ON t.accountId = a.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
SELECT a.name, t.accountId, t.id, t.date, t.description, t.amount FROM transactionT t INNER JOIN account a ON t.accountId = a.id WHERE t.accountId = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactionT (accountId, id, date, description, amount) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{id}, #{date}, #{description}, #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE transactionT SET accountId = #{accountId}, id = #{id}, date = #{date}, description = #{description}, amount = #{amount} WHERE id = #{id}
